readable.title: 390986651_c801db91a0
readable.content: A person peaks their head out of a tent set up in a snowy field . A woman emerges from her snow covered tent . a woman sticking her head out of her tent on the side of a snowy moutnain . A woman wearing glasses and a hat pokes her head through the door of a tent on a snowy day . The camper opens up to see snow all around .
